entry.string: This tag will automatically retrieve the item from DynamicData, and present it according to its user-objectdisplay.xd template.
entry.translation: Thees teg veell ootumeteecelly retreeefe-a zee item frum DynemeecDeta, und present it eccurdeeng tu its user-oobjectdeespley.xd templete-a.

entry.string: This tag will retrieve the properties of this item from DynamicData and make them available in the 'properties' variable in your template.
entry.translation: Thees teg veell retreeefe-a zee pruperteees ooff thees item frum DynemeecDeta und meke-a zeem efeeeleble-a in zee 'pruperteees' fereeeble-a in yuoor templete-a.

entry.string: You can then use that variable to build your own layout. The <xar:data-label ...> and <xar:data-output ...> tags allow you to show individual labels or value outputs in the template.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun zeen use-a thet fereeeble-a tu booeeld yuoor oovn leyuoot. Um de hur de hur de hur. Zee <xer:deta-lebel ...> und <xer:deta-ooootpoot ...> tegs elloo yuoo tu shoo indeefidooel lebels oor felooe-a ooootpoots in zee templete-a.

entry.string: APPROACH # 3 : getting the object via API
entry.translation: EPPROECH # 3 : getteeng zee oobject feea EPI

entry.string: After retrieving the object via API, you can pass along the whole object to the template and use <xar:data-display object="$object">,
entry.translation: Effter retreeefing zee oobject feea EPI, yuoo cun pess elung zee vhule-a oobject tu zee templete-a und use-a <xer:deta-deespley oobject="$oobject">,

entry.string: or pass along the properties and work like in APPROACH # 2.
entry.translation: or pess elung zee pruperteees und vurk leeke-a in EPPROECH # 2.

entry.string: Notice for instance that you don't get the option to automatically display the image with <xar:data-output ... > or not here.
entry.translation: Nuteece-a fur instunce-a thet yuoo dun't get zee oopshun tu ootumeteecelly deespley zee imege-a veet <xer:deta-ooootpoot ... > oor nut here-a.
